languages.text: {n}Несколько секунд ваша молитва остается без ответа. И все же... все же через какое-то время нечто прикасается к вашему измученному сознанию. Знакомое ощущение чужеродного присутствия охватывает вас, однако когда оно заговаривает, голоса едва слышны — словно вас отделяют десятки глухих стен.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Несколько секунд ваша молитва остается без ответа. И все же... все же через какое-то время нечто прикасается к вашему измученному сознанию. Знакомое ощущение чужеродного присутствия охватывает вас, однако когда оно заговаривает, голоса едва слышны — словно вас отделяют десятки глухих стен.{/n}

languages.text: {n}For a few moments, your prayer goes unanswered. And yet... And yet something does reach your tortured consciousness after a while. The familiar feeling of an alien presence descends upon you, but when it speaks, the voices are barely audible, as though you are separated by dozens of thick walls.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Несколько секунд ваша молитва остается без ответа. И все же... все же через какое-то время нечто прикасается к вашему измученному сознанию. Знакомое ощущение чужеродного присутствия охватывает вас, однако когда оно заговаривает, голоса едва слышны — словно вас отделяют десятки глухих стен.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}For a few moments your prayer remains unanswered. And yet... And yet something does reach your tortured consciousness after a while. The familiar feeling of alien presence descends upon you, but when it speaks, the voices are barely heard — as if you were separated by dozens of thick walls.{/n}

{n}For a few moments your prayer remains unanswered. And yet... And yet something does reach your tortured consciousness after a while. The familiar feeling of alien presence descends upon you, but when it speaks, the voices are barely heard — as if you were separated by dozens of thick walls.{/n}

The familiar feeling of an alien presence descends upon you, but when it speaks, the voices are barely audible, as though you are separated by dozens of thick walls.{/n}

{n}For a few moments, your prayer goes unanswered. And yet... And yet something does reach your tortured consciousness after a while. The familiar feeling of an alien presence descends upon you, but when it speaks, the voices are barely audible, as though you are separated by dozens of thick walls.{/n}

{n}For a few moments, your prayer goes unanswered. And yet... And yet something does reach your tortured consciousness after a while. The familiar feeling of an alien presence descends upon you, but when it speaks, the voices are barely audible, as though you are separated by dozens of thick walls.{/n}

languages.text: {n}有那么一瞬间，你的祷告没有得到任何回应。然而……过了一会儿之后，你确实感觉到，有什么东西传达到了你饱受折磨的意识之中。某种你早已熟悉的异界意识降临到了你的身上，但当它开口的时候，你几乎无法听清它的声音，仿佛你们之间隔着几十道厚厚的墙壁一样。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For a few moments, your prayer goes unanswered. And yet... And yet something does reach your tortured consciousness after a while. The familiar feeling of an alien presence descends upon you, but when it speaks, the voices are barely audible, as though you are separated by dozens of thick walls.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}有那么一瞬间，你的祷告没有得到任何回应。然而……过了一会儿之后，你确实感觉到，有什么东西传达到了你饱受折磨的意识之中。某种你早已熟悉的异界意识降临到了你的身上，但当它开口的时候，你几乎无法听清它的声音，仿佛你们之间隔着几十道厚厚的墙壁一样。{/n}

languages.text: {n}何度か試みたが祈りは届かない。しかし…しばらくすると、拷問を受けた意識に何かが届いた。どこか馴染みのある異質な気配が目の前に立ちはだかり、こちらに語りかけているが、何重もの厚い壁に隔てられているかのようでほとんど聞こえない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For a few moments, your prayer goes unanswered. And yet... And yet something does reach your tortured consciousness after a while. The familiar feeling of an alien presence descends upon you, but when it speaks, the voices are barely audible, as though you are separated by dozens of thick walls.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}何度か試みたが祈りは届かない。しかし…しばらくすると、拷問を受けた意識に何かが届いた。どこか馴染みのある異質な気配が目の前に立ちはだかり、こちらに語りかけているが、何重もの厚い壁に隔てられているかのようでほとんど聞こえない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Por unos momentos, tu plegaria no obtiene respuesta. Sin embargo... sin embargo, algo termina por alcanzar tu consciencia torturada. La sensación familiar de una presencia ajena te invade, pero, cuando habla, las voces son casi inaudibles, como si hubiera una multitud de muros gruesos entre vosotros.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For a few moments, your prayer goes unanswered. And yet... And yet something does reach your tortured consciousness after a while. The familiar feeling of an alien presence descends upon you, but when it speaks, the voices are barely audible, as though you are separated by dozens of thick walls.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Por unos momentos, tu plegaria no obtiene respuesta. Sin embargo... sin embargo, algo termina por alcanzar tu consciencia torturada. La sensación familiar de una presencia ajena te invade, pero, cuando habla, las voces son casi inaudibles, como si hubiera una multitud de muros gruesos entre vosotros.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pendant quelques instants, votre prière reste sans réponse, mais soudain... quelque chose touche votre conscience torturée. Le sentiment familier d'une présence étrangère vous submerge, mais lorsque les voix se mettent à parler, elles sont à peine audibles, comme si une dizaine de murs épais vous séparaient.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For a few moments, your prayer goes unanswered. And yet... And yet something does reach your tortured consciousness after a while. The familiar feeling of an alien presence descends upon you, but when it speaks, the voices are barely audible, as though you are separated by dozens of thick walls.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pendant quelques instants, votre prière reste sans réponse, mais soudain... quelque chose touche votre conscience torturée. Le sentiment familier d'une présence étrangère vous submerge, mais lorsque les voix se mettent à parler, elles sont à peine audibles, comme si une dizaine de murs épais vous séparaient.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Einige Augenblicke bleibt dein Gebet unbeantwortet. Und dennoch ... nach einer Weile erreicht irgendetwas dein geschundenes Bewusstsein. Das vertraute Gefühl einer fremdartigen Präsenz senkt sich auf dich herab, doch als sie spricht, sind die Stimmen kaum hörbar, als wärt ihr durch Dutzende dicker Mauern getrennt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For a few moments, your prayer goes unanswered. And yet... And yet something does reach your tortured consciousness after a while. The familiar feeling of an alien presence descends upon you, but when it speaks, the voices are barely audible, as though you are separated by dozens of thick walls.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Einige Augenblicke bleibt dein Gebet unbeantwortet. Und dennoch ... nach einer Weile erreicht irgendetwas dein geschundenes Bewusstsein. Das vertraute Gefühl einer fremdartigen Präsenz senkt sich auf dich herab, doch als sie spricht, sind die Stimmen kaum hörbar, als wärt ihr durch Dutzende dicker Mauern getrennt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bir süre boyunca duaların yanıt bulmuyor. Ancak yine de... Ancak yine de bir süre sonra acı içindeki zihnine bir şeyler uzanıyor. Yabancı bir varlığın tanıdık hissi, etrafını sarıyor. Ancak sanki onlarca kalın duvarın arkasından konuşuyor, söylediklerini duyamıyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For a few moments, your prayer goes unanswered. And yet... And yet something does reach your tortured consciousness after a while. The familiar feeling of an alien presence descends upon you, but when it speaks, the voices are barely audible, as though you are separated by dozens of thick walls.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bir süre boyunca duaların yanıt bulmuyor. Ancak yine de... Ancak yine de bir süre sonra acı içindeki zihnine bir şeyler uzanıyor. Yabancı bir varlığın tanıdık hissi önünde duruyor ancak söylediği şeyleri duyamıyorsun. Sanki onlarca kalın duvarın arkasından konuşuyor gibi.{/n}
